Title: Wolverine
Description: ['Logan learns that his girlfriend, Mariko Yashida, who disappeared a year ago, has been taken to Tokyo by her father Shingen, who is the head of a Japanese crime syndicate and a supplier of AIM. He then decides to head to Japan to find her and take her back, no matter what.']
Related: ['Other: Majokko Shimai no Yoyo to Nene']
Characters: ['Howlett, James', 'Yukio', 'Summers, Scott', 'Mikage, Kikyou', 'Kurohagi, Juo', 'Asano, Tesshin', 'Yashida, Mariko', 'Takagi', 'Machida', 'Tsukino']
Voices: ['Koyama, Rikiya', 'Park, Romi', 'Morikawa, Toshiyuki', 'Hagiwara, Masato', 'Hayami, Show', 'Terasoma, Masaki', 'Orikasa, Fumiko', 'Tsuchida, Hiroshi', 'Takaguchi, Kousuke', 'Mizusawa, Fumie']
